definition: easy and not involved or complicated
details:
adjective
- easy and not involved or complicated
= example: easy and not involved or complicated
= synonyms: simple, uncomplicated, unproblematic
- of or being the essential or basic part
= example: of or being the essential or basic part
= synonyms: primary
- of or pertaining to or characteristic of elementary school or elementary education
= example: of or pertaining to or characteristic of elementary school or elementary education
